info.description: K-Kids API. Due to security concerns all calls to this API requires authentication. If you have access then you may use your KumpeApps username/password to authenticate. To gain access please use the contact developer link below.
info.title: K-Kids API

tags.name: authentication
tags.description: Authenticate KKid users (required to get apiKey)

get.summary: authenticates K-Kids user and returns user parameters
get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can authenticate a user and return their parameters and recieve an apiKey.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username or Email of user

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password of user

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

401.description: Unauthorized- API credentials not supplied. Ensure you have passed proper Username and Password parameters

403.description: Forbidden- User access is denied. API user either does not have access or has been banned/locked.

405.description: Method Not Allowed- API user does not have access to use this method

412.description: API Access Denied! Your API key is invalid, expired, or not supplied!

put.summary: sets API Key to Expired (logout user)
put.description: By passing in the appropriate API Key you can set the key to expire immediately. This is used to logout a user from your application. PLEASE do this once you no longer require the API Key!

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key you wish to invalidate

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

405.description: Method Not Allowed- API user does not have access to use this method

post.description: By passing in the appropriate variables this method creates a new user with master account access. (The use of this method is restricted to Superusers ONLY)

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: username of user to create

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: password of user to create

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: email address of user to create

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: First Name of user to create

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Last Name of user to create

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

405.description: Method Not Allowed- API user does not have access to use this method

409.description: Create user unsuccessful! This is normally because the username or password already exists in the KumpeApps system.

get.description:
By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
users within the authenticated user's master account

parameters.name: isChild
parameters.description: Filter Search by isChild flag

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: Filter Search by isActive flag

parameters.name: isAdmin
parameters.description: Filter Search by isAdmin flag

parameters.name: enableAllowance
parameters.description: Filter Search by enableAllowance flag

parameters.name: enableChores
parameters.description: Filter Search by enableChores flag

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: userID of user to search

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of user to search

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address of user to search

parameters.name: outputCase
parameters.description: output as snake_case by supplying snake. camelCase is default

parameters.name: boolAsInt
parameters.description: true returns booleans as int values instead of true/false

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

401.description: Unauthorized- API credentials not supplied. Ensure you have passed proper Username and Password parameters

403.description: Forbidden- User access is denied. API user either does not have access or has been banned/locked.

405.description: Method Not Allowed- API user does not have access to use this method

412.description: API Access Denied! Your API key is invalid, expired, or not supplied!

post.description: By passing in the appropriate variables this method creates a new user and assigns it to the master account of the authenticated user. By default this user will have chores and allowance access.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: username of user to create

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: password of user to create

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: email address of user to create

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: First Name of user to create

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Last Name of user to create

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

405.description: Method Not Allowed- API user does not have access to use this method

409.description: Create user unsuccessful! This is normally because the username or password already exists in the KumpeApps system.

412.description: API Access Denied! Your API key is invalid, expired, or not supplied!

put.description: By passing in the appropriate variables this method updates the user's profile

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: userID of the user you wish to update

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: username of user to create

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: password of user to create

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: email address of user to create

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: First Name of user to create

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Last Name of user to create

parameters.name: emoji
parameters.description: emoji character for user

parameters.name: enableChores
parameters.description: set status of chores module enabled

parameters.name: enableAllowance
parameters.description: set status of allowance module enabled

parameters.name: enableAdmin
parameters.description: set status of isAdmin

parameters.name: enableTmdb
parameters.description: set status of enableTmdb (movie and tv search)

parameters.name: enableObjectDetection
parameters.description: set status of enableObjectDetection

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

405.description: Method Not Allowed- API user does not have access to use this method

409.description: Update user unsuccessful. This could be due to invalid userID, new username already exists, new email already exists, or an unknown error.

412.description: API Access Denied! Your API key is invalid, expired, or not supplied!

delete.description: By passing in the appropriate variables this method deletes the specified user. (This function is restricted to Superusers ONLY)

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: userID of the user you wish to delete

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

405.description: Method Not Allowed- API user does not have access to use this method

409.description: Create user unsuccessful! This is normally because the username or password already exists in the KumpeApps system.

412.description: API Access Denied! Your API key is invalid, expired, or not supplied!

get.summary: returns list of chores for given user
get.description:
By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
chores assigned to a given user within the authenticated user's master account

parameters.name: kidUsername
parameters.description: Username of kid you wish to search

parameters.name: day
parameters.description: Day of week for chores (Weekly for weekly chores)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of Chore to search

parameters.name: blockDash
parameters.description: Filter results by blockDash parameter

parameters.name: optional
parameters.description: Filter results by optional parameter

parameters.name: canSteal
parameters.description: Filter results by canSteal parameter

parameters.name: includeUserInfo
parameters.description: pass true to include userlist with chores under each user

parameters.name: outputCase
parameters.description: enter snake to output as snake_case or leave blank for default camelCase

parameters.name: boolAsInt
parameters.description: output bool values as integers

parameters.name: includeCalendar
parameters.description: include calendar notations (default is false)

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

401.description: Unauthorized- API credentials not supplied. Ensure you have passed proper Username and Password parameters

403.description: Forbidden- User access is denied. API user either does not have access or has been banned/locked.

405.description: Method Not Allowed- API user does not have access to use this method

412.description: API Access Denied! Your API key is invalid, expired, or not supplied!

put.summary: updates chore for given chore id
put.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can update the fields of a specific core within the authenticated user's master account

parameters.name: idChoreList
parameters.description: id number of chore you wish to update

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: new status of chore

parameters.name: stolen
parameters.description: mark chore as stolen by sibling

parameters.name: stolenBy
parameters.description: username of sibling that stole the chore (required if stolen is true)

parameters.name: nfcTag
parameters.description: text field of NFC tag that is required to be scanned to check off this chore (normally null)

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: notes field for chore

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: GPS latitude of where the chore was marked

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: GPS longitude of where the chore was marked

parameters.name: altitude
parameters.description: GPS altitude of where the chore was marked

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

401.description: Unauthorized- API credentials not supplied. Ensure you have passed proper Username and Password parameters

403.description: Forbidden- User access is denied. API user either does not have access or has been banned/locked.

405.description: Method Not Allowed- API user does not have access to use this method

412.description: API Access Denied! Your API key is invalid, expired, or not supplied!

post.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can add a chore to given kid username under authenticated user's master account

parameters.name: kidUsername
parameters.description: username of kid to assign the chore to.

parameters.name: day
parameters.description: day of week (Monday, Tuesday....) for the chore. For weekly chores put Weekly or leave blank

parameters.name: nfcTag
parameters.description: text field of nfc tag required to check off chore

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: status of chore (default is todo)

parameters.name: choreName
parameters.description: name of chore

parameters.name: choreDescription
parameters.description: optional chore description

parameters.name: choreNumber
parameters.description: number priority of chore (default is 5)

parameters.name: blockDash
parameters.description: block dash option on this chore

parameters.name: oneTime
parameters.description: mark as one time chore (does not repeat each week)

parameters.name: extraAllowance
parameters.description: ammount of allowance added at end of week for completing this chore

parameters.name: optional
parameters.description: mark as optional chore

parameters.name: reassignable
parameters.description: mark as reassignable (default is true)

parameters.name: canSteal
parameters.description: mark as sibling can steal chore

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: date (yyyy-mm-dd) that you wish the chore to start showing up. (default is today)

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: notes added to chore (visable only on reports, kids do not see this note, this is mostly just for the developer)

parameters.name: requireObjectDetection
parameters.description: require use of camera to detect object detection tag order to check off chore

parameters.name: objectDetectionTag
parameters.description: tag for object detection to search for (required if requireObjectDetection is true)

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

401.description: Unauthorized- API credentials not supplied. Ensure you have passed proper Username and Password parameters

403.description: Forbidden- User access is denied. API user either does not have access or has been banned/locked.

405.description: Method Not Allowed- API user does not have access to use this method

409.description: Conflict- idChoreList parameter was not supplied or is blank

delete.summary: deletes chore for given chore id
delete.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can delete a chore for the given chore id under authenticated user's master account

parameters.name: idChoreList
parameters.description: id of the chore you wish to delete

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

get.summary: returns allowance balance and allowance transactions
get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can view allowance balance and allowance transactions for a given user provided that they are within the masterID account of the authenticated user.

parameters.name: kidUserId
parameters.description: userID of the kid

parameters.name: transactionDays
parameters.description: number of days you wish to search allowance transactions (default is 90 days)

202.description: Accepted- Access Granted but data flow did not complete due to an unknown error.

post.summary: adds new allowance transaction to kidUserID
post.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can add an allowance transaction to a given user.

parameters.name: kidUserId
parameters.description: userID of the kid

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: amount you wish to Add/Subtract (subtract value should be a negative value)

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description (reason) of allowance transaction

parameters.name: transactionType
parameters.description: Transaction Type (Add/Subtract)
